sentence.text: Recently, TMEM98 is supposed to be of great value for the discoveries of anti-tumor drugs.
Clinical lung cancer tissue and normal tissue were collected, and the mRNA expression of TMEM98 in cancer tissue was significantly higher than that in normal tissue.
To conclude, our results indicated that siRNA-TMEM98 inhibited the invasion and migration of lung cancer cells, which can be considered as a novel target for NSCLC treatment.
